column4: so i heard my server beep 3 times the other day, i logged in and did a 'who' and realized that my account name appears twice. does this mean it was haxed?
uh?
nothing, check the logs for connections
out of curiosity, what could it have been besides someone breaking in?
another session you have forgotten about
i kind of wish i had a monitor i could plug into it :\
why do you need monitor if you have ssh ;f
i'm unable to ssh in
no route to host
i shut it off yesterday
i had to go and i wanted to limit any damage someone could do if it were broken into
use hosts.allow and hosts.deny
my router isn't recognizing that the computer is connected?
how would i view the logs of my latest commands run
i don't know what do you mean :f
how about how do i "check the logs for connections"
/var/log/auth.log
any way i can get the ip it was logged in from?
ips are in there ;f
not for me?
